text: unkal penkalil evalenum vipacaram ceytu vit(tatakak kurram cattappat)tal (akkurrattai nirupikka) avalukkaka unkalil nanku catcikalai alaiyunkal. Avarkal (atai unmaippatutti) catciyam kurinal maranam avalutaiya kariyattai mutittuvitum varai allatu allah avalukku oru valiyai erpatuttum varai avalai vittinul tatuttu vaikkavum
